title: Calories in Einstein Bagels
meta_description: Discover calories in einstein bagels, including nutrition facts per bagel, macros, and variations for popular flavors from Einstein Bros.
assumptions: Plain bagel from Einstein Bros. Bagels, standard size (~113 g), baked without added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, preparation, and location; values based on standard Einstein Bros. data. Check menu or app for exacts.

quick_answer.text: One plain Einstein bagel has about 280 kcal, with 56 g carbs and 9 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Einstein plain bagel?
What are the carbs in Einstein bagels?
faqs.a: About 56 g carbs per plain bagel, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: Calories in Einstein bagels with cream cheese?
faqs.a: Adds ~80 kcal for 1 oz plain cream cheese, totaling ~360 kcal.
Yes, around 2 g dietary fiber per plain bagel.

faqs.q: How does sodium in Einstein bagels compare?
faqs.a: Plain bagel has ~480 mg sodium; flavored ones may be higher.
